## PopulatableRmm interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Prepare rmm transactions for sending from signer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PopulatableRmm<R = unknown, S = unknown, P = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [PopulatableEthersRmm](./rmm-ethers.populatableethersrmm.md) R = Receipt type, S = SentTransaction type, P = populated transaction type

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [allocate(params)](./rmm-ethers.populatablermm.allocate.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Allocates liquidity by depositing both pool tokens. |
|  [createEngine(params)](./rmm-ethers.populatablermm.createengine.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Deploys a new Engine contract |
|  [remove(params)](./rmm-ethers.populatablermm.remove.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |
|  [safeBatchTransfer(params)](./rmm-ethers.populatablermm.safebatchtransfer.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Transfers a batch of liquidity tokens to a <code>recipient</code> account. |
|  [safeTransfer(params)](./rmm-ethers.populatablermm.safetransfer.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Transfers liquidity to a <code>recipient</code> account. |
